attributes.action: Get Queen to address subjects on UK EU membership. Has she confidence in her PM?
attributes.additional_details:
This Referendum is to determine an existential issue and The Queen has a duty to address her subjects and give an honest opinion of her views.

She is there to advise. It is time she MUST advise her subjects.

If she has no confidence in her Prime Minister and her Europhile Ministers she should dismiss them, address the nation and allow her subjects to chose a constitutional Monarchy or subject to 'citizenship' under an unelected foreign power.
attributes.background: The Sun has revealed that Her Majesty is sceptical of UK membership of the European Union. Millions of people believe her realm has been given away and that this is unlawful.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for the Queen, and the UK Government and Parliament do not have the power to make the Queen give an address.
